description: Client for Ebbflow.io. This is used to proxy SSH or TCP connections between ebbflow and your local server. It typically runs as a daemon which is initiated during the install process, but can also be ran directly which suits containers. See the client [code on github](https://github.com/ebbflow-io/ebbflow), or see [ebbflow.io](https://ebbflow.io) for even more information.
author: Ebbflow
